notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected areas of displaced person settlements in the Idlib, Lattakia and Aleppo Governorates, Syria. Using satellite imagery collected between 7 September 2016 and 10 February 2017, covering an analyzed area of 9,039 sq km (903,920 ha), UNOSAT identified 267 locations where possible displaced persons shelters are visible. Approximately a total of 63,771 shelter structures are estimated to be within the 1,501 ha of settlement areas. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
